name: Tower Possess
description: Tower defense game where your goal is to eliminate  enemy players from making to end of the level. The game offers six varieties of turret and only a single variety of enemy due to limitations on time. Tower Posses was made over the span of two weeks for the six week MoonRift Game Jam where many members left the teams and corrupted files were had. Through all that though a finished product was pushed with the help of Frank K and Randy L especially.
